Software Engineer - iOS

We are looking for a talented iOS engineer to contribute to our core mobile product for the iPhone and iPad platforms.

HappyCo is moving more and more into the enterprise world, which means there will be lots of opportunities to work on new exciting features that arenâ€™t typical of mobile apps. You will be working alongside the rest of the team to drive new features from conception, prototyping, implementation, launch and further iteration.

Ideally you will have a strong software engineering background and experience writing enterprise-grade, fault-tolerant software. As you will be working within an existing team and codebase, your ability to quickly learn and familiarize yourself with new concepts will be extremely important, as will a passion for refactoring, eliminating technical debt and generally making things better.
